purpose: To provide a flexible framework for building autonomous agents in Elixir, enabling dynamic workflows and distributed behavior.
principle: The framework emphasizes event-driven architecture and functional programming principles, allowing agents to react to events and manage workflows efficiently.
reusability: Components of the framework are designed to be reusable across different projects, promoting modularity and reducing redundancy in code.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, the framework may lack full stability and comprehensive documentation, which could limit its usability in production environments.
